name: sharpen
effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.
